alert.note: Alert for Central Colorado River Basin; Central Gunnison and Uncompahgre River Basin; Central Yampa River Basin; Debeque to Silt Corridor; Grand Valley; Lower Yampa River Basin; Paradox Valley, Lower Dolores River; Upper Gunnison River Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued June 13 at 7:56PM MDT until June 13 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of east central, northeast and southeast Utah and northwest, southwest and west central Colorado. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds may blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.
